snippet: The Denver Nuggets will be without the versatile forward Danilo Gallinari for the rest of the season after tests showed he tore his left A.C.L. against Dallas on Thursday.
abstract: Denver Nuggets will be without forward Danilo Gallinari for rest of season after tests show he tore his left anterior cruciate ligament.
lead_paragraph: The Denver Nuggets will be without the versatile forward Danilo Gallinari for the rest of the season after tests showed he tore his left A.C.L. against Dallas on Thursday.

headline.seo: Nuggets Without Danilo Gallinari for Rest of Season
headline.main: Nuggets Without Gallinari for Rest of Season
